TopicTitle: Is there any transparent strut mod?

Articles.Content:
I want to strut something but I don't want the strut appear on the spacecraft,

does any strut mod only visible in VAB/SPH, invisible on launch?

B9 has an invisible strut part, you will only be able to see the ends of the strut both in the editor and on launch. You can also hide struts inside of things, clipping your camera inside a fuel tank or wing is a good way to accomplish this.
